name: Flashback (drew graham)
description:
This game was made by:

  • Wills Martin (Programmer, VFX) - https://willsmartin.itch.io/
  • Drew Graham (Programmer, Animation) - https://www.drewgrahamdev.com/
  • Harrison Brietling (Level Designer) - http://harrisonbrietling.com/

We used the following assets:

Sprites:  https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack by https://o-lobster.itch.io/

Music:  Forgotten Woods from https://www.playonloop.com/
